description: Five Years Ago This week in 2020, a court finally dumped one of Devin Nunes’ ridiculous lawsuits only for him to immediately promise to file another, while Public Citizen weighed in on why the famous cow’s information should be protected under the First Amendment and a watchdog group asked the Congressional Ethics Office to investigate […]
title: This Week In Techdirt History: February 23rd – March 1st

description: A couple of years back, we talked about how Ubisoft handled its own accidental leak of the Beyond Good & Evil remaster to its subscribers. Months before it was due to be released, a technical error resulted in an incomplete version of the game suddenly being available on Ubisoft+. Some people grabbed copies of it, […]
title: Ubisoft Repeats Past Mistakes, And Past Successes, In Addressing ‘Assassin’s Creed’ Leak
